Title: Parallel Artificial Membrane Permeability Assay (PAMPA) 7
Description: Cell membrane permeability is important for determining oral absorption and bioavailability of drug molecule. Parallel artificial membrane permeability assay (PAMPA) is a low-cost alternative to cellular models for early ADME screening. PAMPA 7 improves upon the previous PAMPA 5 assay with the addition of new membrane types.
